00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <mfhdf.h>
00020 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00021 
00035 MTKt_status MtkFileGridToResolution(
00036   const char *filename, 
00037   const char *gridname, 
00038   int *resolution   )
00039 {
00040   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return code of this function */
00041   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00042   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00043   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS file identifier */
00044 
00045   if (filename == NULL)
00046     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00047 
00048   fid = GDopen((char *)filename, DFACC_READ);
00049   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00050 
00051   /* Get resolution of grid. */
00052   status = MtkFileGridToResolutionFid(fid, gridname, resolution);
00053   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00054 
00055   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00056   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00057   fid = FAIL;
00058 
00059   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00060  ERROR_HANDLE:
00061   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00062   return status_code;
00063 }
00064 
00070 MTKt_status MtkFileGridToResolutionFid(
00071   int32 fid,            
00072   const char *gridname, 
00073   int *resolution   )
00074 {
00075   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return code of this function */
00076   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00077   int32 gid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS grid identifier */
00078   int32 res_x;          /* Resolution in Som X */
00079   int32 res_y;          /* Resolution in Som Y */
00080 
00081   if (gridname == NULL || resolution == NULL)
00082     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00083 
00084   gid = GDattach(fid, (char *)gridname);
00085   if (gid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00086 
00087   hdfstatus = GDreadattr(gid, "Block_size.resolution_x", (void *)&res_x);
00088   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDREADATTR_FAILED);
00089 
00090   hdfstatus = GDreadattr(gid, "Block_size.resolution_y", (void *)&res_y);
00091   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDREADATTR_FAILED);
00092 
00093   hdfstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00094   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00095 
00096   if (res_x != res_y) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00097 
00098   *resolution = res_x;
00099 
00100   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00101  ERROR_HANDLE:
00102   if (gid != FAIL) GDdetach(gid);
00103   return status_code;
00104 }
